alert.note: Alert for Northern Monterey Bay; San Fransisco Peninsula Coast; Santa Cruz Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 21 at 1:04AM PDT until March 21 at 9:00PM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 9 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...San Francisco Peninsula Coast, Santa Cruz Mountains and Northern Monterey Bay. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to 9 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Very strong and gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Trees and tree limbs could be blown down and result in damage to nearby structures, power outages and blocked roads. Saturated soils can make it easier for trees to fall. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest winds expected near the coast and in the higher ridges and peaks of the Santa Cruz Mountains and Diablo Range.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Northern Monterey Bay; San Fransisco Peninsula Coast; Santa Cruz Mountains
